TopicTitle: Is the magazine "The Kerbal Chronicals" available as a PDF?

Articles.Content: It's really cool and I would like to have it as a full sized PDF.
Yes. Here you go: https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/files/The Kerbal Chronicles.pdf
I'm a runner-up in the contest because I'm almost funny enough. Did printed versions of this ever go out?
Moving to Kerbal Network, since this is about the forum & the contest, rather than about KSP itself.
